title: Component Stats Analyzer Executor
description: Analyze Angular component usage and save results to JSON

projectPath.description: Path to the Angular project to analyze (relative to workspace root)

outputFile.description: Path where the analysis results JSON file should be saved (relative to workspace root)

tsconfigPath.description: Optional path to tsconfig.json (relative to workspace root)

minUsage.description: Optional minimum usage count to include in results

includeUnused.description: Whether to include unused components in the results
